review: Doctor is good but I could not get to meet the doctor. His assistant only visited and consulted. Why the charge will be same for doctor and assistant?

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was not aware that my pain was due to flat foot.I was recommended a surgery by other doctor and I was worried. Natraj doctor explained the issue and stopped pain killers and told me to use shoe arch support. Now my problem is cured without surgery. Extremely thankful to sir for his treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Oh my God such a nice human being, down to earth person,never seen such respect from a doctor, I am very young compare to doctors age but he started calling me sir as I was addressing him sir, I was shocked and stunned for the doctor mutual respect and about treatment again he is the first the doctor to look all the MRI films with patience like not just looking for the sake of patient (it was nearly 12) and explained the issue and the treatment and I am so happy about the visit and I gained confidence that I can recover completely by follwing the doctor advise. Thank you Sir.

tags: Wait time,
review: It's the 2nd time we took doctor's appointment but somehow after waiting for good 90 minutes we had to get back as the doctor was taking too long to see the patient. Last time we took Dr Natraj appointment but got consultation from other doctor.  I understand that he is proficient in his work *** *** ************ ** *** ****** **** *********** ******* *** *********** Don't go to Belenus to visit him rather go to some other doctor who respects your time and respond to your problem.
reply_text:
Dear sir, 
Really appreciate your feedback, this helps us to improve our services. I will explain what happened that day.  When you visited the hospital, during that time 12 patients registered in an internal of 45min ( ideally 3 patients can be seen in 45 min). Its not a mistake of hospital or doctor when more patients register at a time(some are late for the their appointments, some are early, some are emergencies). So the back log continued. That day I continued seeing patients without taking lunch break so that I can clear all the waiting patients. I was pretty much sitting in my cabin and seeing patients without stepping out. No appointments were cancelled but got delayed due to the rush. 
Thank you

tags: None
review:
Confident Specialty Clinic is indispensable especially after my experience with Dr.Nataraj, we visited the clinic to understand the root cause of a pain (around the lower ribs) and subsequent treatment. 

The diagnosis was indeed perfect and after following his medication the pain vanished. He also recommended Ultrasound physiotherapy which was followed for 5 days. The physiotherapist (Ms. Megna) is also very knowledgeable and cordial. 

It would not be an exaggeration if I say Dr.Nataraj is indeed an expert orthopedist and one of the very few in Bangalore to have  given us a lucid explanation about the pain which helped us to keep our cool and stay bother-free.

tags: None
review: It was a great experience with Dr Nataraj H M even though the front desk experience was not that great. I took my father who was suffering from knee pain from 3 years for consultation. The doctor is well read and explained us the problem which my father is suffering from with pictures on his laptop and scientific explanations. He explained all the treatment options for the disease. Previously we visited 2 very big hospitals but no body explained to us so well, they just said admit him for knee replacement surgery. Knee pain reduced with the course of medicine and physiotherapy(Even the physiotherapist was awesome) which the doctor prescribed but still understood that Knee replacement surgery is the permanent cure. Definitely I will get my father's knee replaced by Dr Nataraj after few months.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I wanted to write a review for Dr. Natraj Sir as he is such a nice human being, down to earth person,never seen such respect from a doctor.
My mother (Kakali Podder) was having knee problems from last 15 years and she wasn‚Äôt able to walk properly due to pain and on 2nd dec 2021 he did knee replacement surgery in manipal hospital sarjapura and now she is much better and operation went successful and all thanks to him. * **** *** **** ** ** ********* **** *** ** ********* ** ************. I don‚Äôt have enough words  to say anything but yes I‚Äôll never forget him. God bless him. Thanks üôèüèª

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited for my right ankle as I had twisted it severely while playing badminton. The doctor is very friendly, patient and hears everything you have to say. He then explains the issue in detail.
And if he's certain that there is no need for X-ray and MRI, he will clearly discourage from getting them! 
He even listens to every small question you have and answers them. 
He is available on Sundays at SAKRA (Easy parking availability at SAKRA), which is super convenient.

I would recommend Dr. Natraj in a heartbeat!
reply_text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr.Natraj              We wish you the best of health in the future! ‚Äú

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I thank Dr Nataraj for doing a successful shoulder keyhole surgery for my mother in law. She was suffering from shoulder pain from almost a year due to rotator cuff tear. We met couple of doctors but we were not confident to undergo surgery by them. Then I remembered Dr Nataraj who had done a keyhole shoulder surgery for my colleague for shoulder dislocation and he recovered very well. So we thought of meeting him once for a opinion. We were fully convinced that we met a right person and underwent surgery. He was very helpful throughout and made all the process very smooth including arranging a physio to come to our home. Now my mother in law is pain free, able to cook and take care of our children. I fully recommend him for shoulder surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
One of the humblest and simple doctors we have met so far. Very good with kids. My son would not allow anyone to touch his hand except the doctor. 
He is thorough with his examination and does not recommend anything without need. He recommended physiotherapy only after observing some stiffness in the joints unlike others who just recommend the physio as a norm. 
Always available and tells us to message him if we need any help. Responds within few mins when we message him for clarifications. 
Above all, a wonderful human being..
reply_text: ‚ÄúThank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Natraj HM             We wish you the best of health in the future! ‚Äú

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Slip Disc,Neck Pain Treatment,Sprain,Ligament and Tendon Repair,
review: In my opinion, I feel that the patients consulting Dr. Nataraj sir are blessed ‚Äì We are blessed by god to have such a talented doctor who meticulously diagnose the problem of any Ortho related problems and usually suggests simple remedies without unwanted tests and with minimal medicines. Despite patients asks for X-Ray or MRI, unless absolutely needed, he don‚Äôt suggest going for these tests. Including me, I have referred or taken at least another 10 patients, and all are of the same opinion. My sincere thanks and appreciations to him for helping people on these Ortho related problems.
reply_text:
Dear sir,
Thank you for the kind words. I just follow the standard protocols already given by great doctors and scientists earlier. I‚Äôm nothing without my patients so helping them to the best of my capacity is my moto. 
Regards,
Dr Nataraj H M
www.kneeandahoulder.net
